timers.name: Tabata
timers.description: 20 seconds of high-intensity exercise followed by 10 seconds of rest, repeated for 8 rounds.

timers.name: HIIT
timers.description: 30 seconds of high-intensity exercise followed by 15 seconds of rest, repeated for 10 rounds.

timers.name: Round Timer
timers.description: 45 seconds of exercise followed by 20 seconds of rest, repeated for 5 rounds.

timers.name: Tabata Core
timers.description: Tabata-style workout focusing on core exercises. 20 seconds of exercise followed by 10 seconds of rest, repeated for 8 rounds.

timers.name: HIIT Cardio
timers.description: High-intensity interval training focused on cardiovascular exercises. 45 seconds of high-intensity exercise followed by 15 seconds of rest, repeated for 12 rounds.

timers.name: EMOM (Every Minute on the Minute)
timers.description: Complete a set amount of exercises within each minute, resting for the remainder of the minute if completed early. 10 rounds.

timers.name: Pyramid Intervals
timers.description: Progressively increasing and decreasing intervals. Start with 20 seconds, then 30 seconds, and so on up to 50 seconds, then reverse. Rest for 15 seconds between each interval. 6 rounds.

timers.name: AMRAP (As Many Rounds As Possible)
timers.description: Complete as many rounds of a set workout as possible within 5 minutes.

timers.name: Custom Timer
timers.description: Create a custom timer with your own intervals and rounds.
